months.title: Consolidating the 10K
months.focus: Strengthen your base, balancing effort with control.
months.mantra: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
months.goal: Maintain 8K distance while exploring your tempo pace.

months.title: Building Distance
months.focus: Extend your distance with mindful effort, introducing speedwork.
months.mantra: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
months.goal: Increase your long run to 9K and focus on disciplined intervals.

months.title: Distance and Tempo Focus
months.focus: Develop consistency in longer distances while refining your tempo efforts.
months.mantra: You have the right to perform your duty, but not to the fruits of the action.
months.goal: Build consistency at 10K while pushing your tempo pace.

months.title: Strengthen Pacing & Intervals
months.focus: Increase your interval sessions for speed and endurance.
months.mantra: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
months.goal: Push through obstacles by extending your long run to 12K and improving interval work.

months.title: Breakthrough Distance
months.focus: Increase distance while holding a steady tempo, focusing on your internal journey.
months.mantra: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
months.goal: Reach 14K comfortably, and deepen your focus during tempo sessions.

months.title: Sharpening Speed
months.focus: Increase long-run distance while refining your pace in shorter, faster efforts.
months.mantra: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
months.goal: Extend your long run to 16K, and build strength in intervals.

months.title: Prepping for Race Pace
months.focus: Extend your long run towards race day distance while practising your race pace.
months.mantra: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
months.goal: Achieve race pace during your long run, trusting your bodyâ€™s progress.

months.title: Peak for Half Marathon
months.focus: Final preparation for race day, with a focus on control and calmness.
months.mantra: Be steadfast in yoga, O Arjuna. Perform your duty and abandon all attachment to success or failure.
months.goal: Simulate race conditions, focus on mental strength and pacing.
